# TweenMode.linear

**Case**

An option that indicates that a keyframe changes to the next gradually.

## Declaration

```swift
case linear
```

## Choosing a mode between frames

- **TweenMode.hold**: An option that indicates a keyframe changes to the next abruptly.

items.description: An option that indicates a keyframe changes to the next abruptly.
items.name: TweenMode.hold
